result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Offer to Settle
of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 8 cases. Agreement is as spelled out in offer to settle. Charges and penalties read. PLEA NC to 14 counts. DRI 17CF163 Ct2,4-6  17CF159 ct1,4-8,13-16  17CF98 17CM3 16CM159 and 16CM74. Elements of crime(s) read, def admits amounts, asks court to accept pleas, stipulates to facts. Ct reviews complaints. Ct accepts pleas and finds def guilty, 242 poss weapon, mbj, 83 fbj,obst,mbj, 159 fbj,obst,poss thc, poss herion,poss meth,mbj  163 fbj,mbj,battery. Ct orders PSI.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 31, 2017 at 02:15 pm.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 8 cases. Atty Hoffmann asks for a plea hearing date, officer includes option for PSI.  Status conference scheduled for August 28, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 8 cases. Atty Hoffmann has made counter offer this morning, asks for another date.  Status conference scheduled for August 21, 2017 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 8 cases. 17CF163 prelim hearing, other felonies for arraignment and other cases status. Atty Hoffmann 17CF163 waives right to prelim, ct finds knowing/vol waives right, ct finds prob cause case bound over. ADA would not be changing charging language on the case, short recess then arraignment on all cases. Back on record, all informations are the same charges in the original complaint, waives reading and stands mute. Status all cases.  Status conference scheduled for August 7, 2017 at 01:15 pm.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by phone means. In initial hearing, rec copy of compl, waives reading. Stands mute. 17CF83,98,159 waives prelim, 17CF163 waives time limits and asks for prelim hearing. In 17CF83,98 and 159 ct finds probable cause cases bound over. 17CF163 prelim 7/7 3:30. Argn 7/7 3:30 and STC on others. ADA asks on new case 17cf163 covered under current cash bail with condition NC with tyler benton  Status conference scheduled for July 7, 2017 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 6cases. Def comments on bail. DA comments. Ct comments on bail in 17CM3 $10000 cash (included in other amt $20000).  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2017 at 01:45 pm.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 6 cases. Warrants canceled. Scheduled today for bail bond ff, no judgment entered, state may file motion on ff. Ct finds probable cause in new case. Bond Reinstated in all previous cases. ADA comments no bail set on 17CF98 yet, DA comments asks for significant cash bail, no MAS, not present, absol, no para, nodru. Atty Hoffmann no objection to non monetary conditions, has no money to post. Ct orders cash bail $20000, absol, no MAS, no para, not present, nodru. Initial/status conf  Status conference scheduled for June 26, 2017 at 10:15 am.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def is not here. Atty comnments does not know where def is. BOW statewide for mism and Fel nationwide. bond ff

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 5 cases. Failure to appear for hearing 4/6/17. Warrants canceled. Atty Hoffmann Def thought his hearing was today. Appr at hearing in Bayfield co yesterday and was taken into custody at that time. ADA comments on bail asks for $2000 cash bail. Atty Hoffmann comments on bail. Ct asks if Def has anyone who would cosign a bond. Def indicates his grandmother might, Sandy Deragon. Ct finds that Def could have attended hearing as ordered/scheduled failure to appr his fault, Forfiets $100 cash bail. 
Atty Hoffmann requests STC on all cases except for 17CM3 and 17CF83 initial needs to be complete
Ct orders Def appr in person, STC and AIA.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 17, 2017 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def does not appr 5 cases. Atty Hoffmann made bail, atty does not know where he is. BOW each case Statewide in misd, nationwide on felonies. BB FF

Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court for Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. 17CF83 initial, Atty Hoffmann requests adj initial. Adj Initial 17CF83 4/6 1:30pm Status conferences on all others.  Status conference scheduled for April 6, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. 4 open cases and new charges. Warrants canceled...16CM74 comments on missed status conference. New charge, ct finds prob cause. Ct- cash bail cases. ADA asks for cash bail, previous conditions continue. Def comments on bail. Ct reinstates previous conditions. New arrest $1500 cash. Given right to atty. On cases where there was cash bail previously ordered def will have to post again  Status conference scheduled for April 3, 2017 at 01:15 pm.

16CM74, 16CM159, 16CM242 Attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann in court on behalf of Mr. Ford.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No auth in 16CM242.  Atty does not know where client is.  BOW warrant and bond forfeited in ALL Cases.  All authorizations in other cases revoked.

16 CM 242, 16 CM 159 - Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rec'd copy each compl & stand mute to 16 CM 74 & 159.  16 CM 242} req AIA. STC others.  1/3 @ 9:15 am....AIA & set bail n/c w/S.F. & no danger weopon.  Not wking, not going to school.  Bond set $2500/sign, no danger weopons, finger, N/C w/SF....  Status conference scheduled for January 3, 2017 at 09:15 am.

16CM74 and 16CM159 Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford in court.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rec complaint - wants atty - contacted SPD bond cont.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Mahzhaquad M. Ford not in court, defendant in custody appear via v/con from ACJ. Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 16CM74 and 16CM159. WARRANTS CANCELLED. 48187 Birch hill lane Saxon. Lived there since he was younger, lives with mother and brother. no job, not on probation. does not attend school. no reason as to why he missed court. no money for cash bail. Could be elig. for TAD bail. State asking for Cash bail. prev conditions of bail apply and include TAD. Def plans on going to ct- wants to get everyhting done. CASh bail covers BOTH cases $250.00 , TAD assessment- if he quilfies for TAD would consider modify to SIGN bond. all prev conditions to remain the same.  Initial appearance scheduled for December 5, 2016 at 10:30 am.
